insert into five_ed_return_visit (business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, contract_no, form_no, construction_org, construction_address, design_finish_time, construction_finish_time, visitor, visit_time, owner_comment, owner_name, design_solve, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end, return_type, raise_question, measure) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designFinishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionFinishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designSolve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{returnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raiseQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measure,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, contract_no, form_no, construction_org, construction_address, design_finish_time, construction_finish_time, visitor, visit_time, owner_comment, owner_name, design_solve, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end, return_type, raise_question, measure from five_ed_return_visit where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, contract_no, form_no, construction_org, construction_address, design_finish_time, construction_finish_time, visitor, visit_time, owner_comment, owner_name, design_solve, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end, return_type, raise_question, measure from five_ed_return_visit
